attributes.action: Anyone that is being treated for cancer to receive full sick pay from employers
attributes.additional_details: People who are pregnant get sick pay for pregnant related illnesses and time off and that is their own choice to get pregnant ! Cancer patients have no choice
attributes.background: When being treated you don't know how it is going to make you feel therefore you cant say for definite when u will be off work . Which means if your company does not Pay sick pay until the fourth day you could be in work on day and then back the next meaning you don't even get statuary sick pay

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on Parliament to change the law to require employers to offer full sick pay to cancer sufferers.
